statements: SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, time_stamp, vote FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE vote > 10;
SELECT block_hash, time_stamp FROM blockchain_transactions ORDER BY time_stamp DESC;
SELECT voter_id, candidate_id FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE voter_id = '6202c733-d5c9-47cf-8f8c-ebf2d9b3d90e';
SELECT DISTINCT candidate_id FROM blockchain_transactions ORDER BY candidate_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE voter_id = '1a1b1c1d-2e2f-3g3h-4i4j-5k5l5m5n' ORDER BY time_stamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, time_stamp, vote FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE candidate_id = '6o6p6q6r-7s7t-8u8v-9w9x9y9z' ORDER BY vote DESC;
SELECT voter_id, candidate_id, SUM(vote) as total_votes FROM blockchain_transactions GROUP BY voter_id, candidate_id HAVING total_votes > 50 ORDER BY total_votes DESC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE time_stamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' AND vote > 0 ORDER BY time_stamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT voter_id FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE vote = 1 AND block_hash IS NOT NULL ORDER BY voter_id ASC LIMIT 20;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions;
SELECT transaction_hash, block_number FROM blockchain_transactions ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT voter_id, candidate_id FROM voting_system WHERE vote_status = TRUE;
SELECT voter_id, timestamp FROM voting_system WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE block_number < 1000 ORDER BY transaction_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE block_number = 10 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, timestamp FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE block_number > 100 AND block_number < 200 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY block_number DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, block_number FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE block_number >= 500 ORDER BY transaction_id;
SELECT voter_id, candidate_id FROM voting_system WHERE vote_status = TRUE ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions;
SELECT sender_address, recipient_address, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM voter_records WHERE vote_cast = true;
SELECT voter_name, voter_address FROM voter_records ORDER BY voter_name DESC;
SELECT transaction_type, transaction_time FROM transaction_logs WHERE transaction_time >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY transaction_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_id DESC;
SELECT sender_address, recipient_address FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount < 500 ORDER BY sender_address ASC, recipient_address ASC;
SELECT voter_name, voter_address, vote_cast FROM voter_records WHERE vote_cast = TRUE ORDER BY voter_name ASC;
SELECT transaction_type, transaction_time FROM transaction_logs WHERE transaction_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY transaction_time DESC;
SELECT voter_name, voter_address FROM voter_records WHERE voter_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_hash FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE block_number > 100;
SELECT candidate_name, candidate_party, total_votes FROM candidates ORDER BY total_votes DESC;
SELECT voter_id, voter_name FROM voters WHERE voting_status = true;
SELECT voter_name, registration_date FROM voters ORDER BY registration_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE block_number > 100
SELECT transaction_id, block_number, transaction_data FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE transaction_hash = 'abc123'
SELECT voter_id, voter_name, registration_date FROM voters WHERE voting_status = TRUE
SELECT candidate_name, candidate_party FROM candidates WHERE total_votes > 1000 ORDER BY total_votes DESC

SELECT v.voter_name, c.candidate_name, vh.vote_timestamp FROM voters v JOIN voting_history vh ON v.voter_id = vh.voter_id JOIN candidates c ON vh.candidate_id = c.candidate_id ORDER BY vh.vote_timestamp ASC
SELECT * FROM blocks;
SELECT block_id, timestamp FROM blocks ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT voter_id, voter_name FROM voters WHERE voter_address='123 Main St';
SELECT candidate_name, party_affiliation FROM candidates WHERE party_affiliation='Independent';
SELECT * FROM votes WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM blocks WHERE block_id = 10;
SELECT voter_id, voter_name FROM voters WHERE voter_address = '123 Main St';
SELECT candidate_name, party_affiliation FROM candidates WHERE candidate_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM votes ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT block_id, transactions_count FROM blocks WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
